dict.string:
on run argv my openITerm() set openedInCurrentEmacs to my openInCurrentEmacs() if not openedInCurrentEmacs then my openInNewEmacs() end if
end run
on openITerm() tell application "iTerm" if (count of windows) = 0 then create window with default profile end if end tell end openITerm on openInCurrentEmacs() tell application "iTerm" tell current window # Try to find open emacsclient tab to open file in set tabNum to 1 repeat with aTab in tabs set tabName to name of current session of aTab if (tabName contains "emacsclient (emacsclient)") then activate tell current tab of current window tell application "System Events" keystroke tabNum using command down key code 53 # esc -- Make sure I'm in command mode delay 1.0 keystroke ":edit {query}" keystroke return return true end tell end tell end if set tabNum to (tabNum + 1) end repeat end tell end tell return false end openInCurrentEmacs on openInNewEmacs() tell application "iTerm" tell current window set newTab to (create tab with default profile) set theSession to current session of newTab tell theSession activate delay 1.0 tell application "System Events" keystroke "emacsclient {query}" keystroke return end tell end tell end tell end tell end openInNewEmacs
